parameters.name: DnsRecord
parameters.description: Rewrite the DNS resolution record of the origin request.

parameters.name: OriginHost
parameters.description: The HOST carried in the origin request.

parameters.name: OriginHttpPort
parameters.description: Port of the origin server when using HTTP protocol for origin pull.

parameters.name: OriginHttpsPort
parameters.description: Port of the origin server when using HTTPS protocol for origin pull.

parameters.name: OriginMtls
parameters.description:
mTLS switch. Valid values:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: OriginScheme
parameters.description:
Protocol used for the origin request. Valid values:
- http: Use HTTP protocol for origin pull.
- https: Use HTTPS protocol for origin pull.
- follow: Follow the client's protocol for origin pull.

parameters.name: OriginSni
parameters.description: SNI carried in the origin request.

parameters.name: OriginVerify
parameters.description:
Origin certificate verification switch. Valid values:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description:
Use range chunking for origin pull file download. Valid values:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.
- force: Force.

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description:
Rule content, used to match user requests with conditional expressions. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration. There are two usage scenarios:
- Match all incoming requests: Set the value to true
- Match specific requests: Set the value to a custom expression, for example: (http.host eq \"video.example.com\")

parameters.name: RuleEnable
parameters.description:
Rule switch. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration. Valid values:
- on: Enable.
- off: Disable.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~ListSites~~) interface.
